subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded and top-ranked Amélie Mauresmo of France will face No. 4 Maria Sharapova of Russia, and No. 2 Kim Clijsters will meet No. 3 Justine Henin-Hardenne in an all-Belgian semifinal at Wimbledon.
snippet: The top-seeded and top-ranked Amélie Mauresmo of France will face No. 4 Maria Sharapova of Russia, and No. 2 Kim Clijsters will meet No. 3 Justine Henin-Hardenne in an all-Belgian semifinal at Wimbledon.
